mapper.sql: id, issue_name, company_name, trend_complete, project_desc, publisher, status, created_at, updated_at
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT tre.id, tre.issue_name, tre.status, tre.created_at, tre.updated_at,tre.project_budget,treo.visit_count,treo.apply_count,treo.recommend_count,tre.business_id AS business_id,tre.business_parent_id as business_parent_id,tre.verified AS verified FROM t_recruit_employer tre LEFT JOIN t_recruit_employer_operation treo ON tre.id = treo.employer_id LEFT JOIN t_recruit_employer_master_mapping tremm ON tre.id = tremm.employer_id WHERE tremm.tech_master_id = #{masterId} AND tremm.status = '已绑定'

SELECT tre.id, tre.issue_name, tre.status, tre.created_at, tre.updated_at,tre.company_name, tre.project_budget,tre.reason,tre.master_id,tre.project_cycle,tre.trend_complete, tre.project_desc, tre.publisher,treo.visit_count,treo.apply_count,treo.recommend_count,tre.business_id AS business_id,tre.business_parent_id as business_parent_id FROM t_recruit_employer tre LEFT JOIN t_recruit_employer_operation treo ON tre.id = treo.employer_id WHERE tre.id= #{id}
mapper.update: update t_recruit_employer set issue_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trend_complete = #{trendComplete,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_desc = #{projectDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, publisher = #{publisher,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
